蟉蟉蟉

蟉字的基本解释

蟉
liú
〔蟉虬（
qi?）〕蜷曲，盘曲，如“玄螭虫象并出进兮，形蟉蟉而逶迤。”

蟉字的汉语字典释义

[①]［liú］
［《廣韻》力幽切，平幽，來。］
［《廣韻》渠幽切，平幽，羣。］
［《廣韻》渠黝切，上黝，羣。］
龙蛇蜿蜒行动貌。
[②]［liào］
［《集韻》力弔切，去嘯，來。］
见“蜩2蟉”。

蟉字的康熙字典解释

【申集中】【虫字部】　蟉； 康熙笔画：17； 页码：页1096第10
【唐韻】力幽切，音鏐。?蟉，龍貌。　又【韻會】力九切，音柳。【前漢·司馬相如傳】靑龍蚴蟉于東廂。【師古註】蚴蟉，行動貌。　又【正韻】渠尤切【廣韻】渠黝切，?音虯。義同。　又【集韻】力弔切，音料。蜩蟉。詳蜩字註。　或作繆。

蟉字的源字形

字源演变：

小篆楷体

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体日本明朝体韩国明朝体旧字形
蟉字的起名意思

暂无。

蟉
Basic explanation of words
蟉
liú
〔蟉虬(
qi?)] Curled, twisted, such as "Xuanjia insect elephant goes in and out, and the shape is awkward and awkward."
蟉
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［liú］
["Guangyun" is quiet and quiet, come on. ]
["Guang Yun" It is quiet, quiet, and group. ]
["Guangyun" Qu Zu cut, Shang Zu, group. ]
The behavior of the dragon snake meandering.
[②]［liào］
["Ji Yun" cut, go howl, come. ]
See "Chu 2 蟉".
蟉
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Shenzhen Collection] [Insect Character Department] 　蟉; Kangxi Strokes: 17; Page Number: Page 1096 No. 10
【Tang Yun】Strong and quiet, with sound.蟉, the appearance of the dragon.　[Yunhui] Li Jiuqie, Yinliu. 【Previous Han·Sima Xiangru Biography】Tianlong larvae lived in the East Chamber. 【Shigu Note】Clam, action appearance.　[Zheng Yun] Qu Youqie [Guang Yun] Qu Zuiqie,? Yinqiu. The same meaning.　[Jiyun] Forced to hang and cut, sound material.蟉蟉. Detailed note of the word.　Or make a mistake.
蟉

蟉
Name meaning
Nothing.
liào, qiú
только в сочетаниях; см., напр. 蜩蟉
